glosses: Kızılhisar (a village in Banaz district, Uşak Province, Turkey)
Kızılhisar (a village in Besni district, Adıyaman Province, Turkey)
Kızılhisar (a neighbourhood in Yenişehir district, Bursa Province, Turkey)
synonym of Güzelhisar (“a neighbourhood in Akyurt district”)
synonym of Oğuzeli (“a city and district of Turkey”)
synonym of Serinhisar (“a town and district of Turkey”)
synonym of Torbalı (“a town and district of Turkey”)

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish قزیل حصار (kızıl hisar). By surface analysis, kızıl (“red”) + hisar (“castle, fortress, stronghold”).
